channel.title: Private servers and XXXXXscape
channel.description: why are there different scapes?? liek i saw on this website PKscape, fearscape what is that? adn RS has private servers? i'm new to this website and i haven;e play RS in forever!

item.title: Private servers and XXXXXscape
item.dc:creator: @omfg-oops omfg-oops
item.description:
@omfg-oops wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:7, topic:55133”]RS2 private servers are an attempt by us (not Jagex) at recreating the server runescape uses. We can’t just steal the server they use, since only they have it. If you check it out at moparisthebest.com/smf, you will see the attempts people have been making at making the servers more correct to the true RS2 servers (though I have noticed that people have been posting tutorials to make your server do really wierd things more and more).[/quote] i like moparscape private server games there fun but not the real rs…u get banned for little things like ‘wots for pass’ but in private servers no one cares u can ‘swear’ tell poeple to go fuck them selfs and nothing happneds so i think rs2 is bullcrap

Read full topic

item.title: Private servers and XXXXXscape
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

RS2 private servers are an attempt by us (not Jagex) at recreating the server runescape uses. We can’t just steal the server they use, since only they have it. If you check it out at moparisthebest.com/smf, you will see the attempts people have been making at making the servers more correct to the true RS2 servers (though I have noticed that people have been posting tutorials to make your server do really wierd things more and more).

Read full topic

why are there different scapes?? liek i saw on this website PKscape, fearscape what is that? adn RS has private servers? i’m new to this website and i haven;e play RS in forever!
[/quote]

Private servers are nub. Runescape 2 is nub.

My suggestion: Stay well away from Moparscape.org and use this forum for learning.[/quote]
Rs2 is ok, when you macro and sell the gp for RL $
